attributes.title: No

I come back home to find out i donâ€™t have a home! Set my house on fire!! If youâ€™re wondering how iâ€™m posting this review iâ€™m using my nokia phone. Itâ€™s the only thing that survived the whole ordeal. -â™¾/10 I donâ€™t recommend

attributes.title: um no, just no

Itâ€™s like a spray tan gone wrong, leave it to the blonde teenage girls. Itâ€™s just not a good look on you. Secondly, as soon as I opened this app a bunch of Johnny Galindo accounts started texting me. After that, I accidentally fell off a cliff because I got so distracted by another Cheeto like figure I saw on this app. This app is just a no.

attributes.title: This made me cry
attributes.review: When i went into the app, i saw a big ugly orange. He had his old saggy balls hanging and it made me want to die. I threw up many times but i returned to the app. My pet caterpillar crawled onto my phone and DIED! I cried for many hours but decided that i should eat my caterpillar in honor. When i was walking my pet T-rex i saw donald trump, flying in the sky totally naked. He was swinging his peepee out and i died. I am now a ghost. RIP me

attributes.title: I donâ€™t expect much but Iâ€™m still let down
attributes.review: This app is disappointing. It is as stupid as the man who claims it. It asked to many personal questions that I will never submit to answer. There is no reason for this carrot stick to know my private info. This man also has the audacity to ask for my money when he was millions. If I was allowed I wouldâ€™ve rated the app zero stars. VOTE BLUE.
